eventDecorators.name: Canceled
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: CollateralWithdrawExecuted
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: DepositExecuted
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: EarningsToggled
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: EarningsWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: LoanExecuted
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: ProposeCollateralWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: ProposeDeposit
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: ProposeLoan
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: ProposeRepayLoan
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: ProposeToggleEarnings
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: RepayLoanExecuted
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: WithdrawToDAO
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: WithdrawToMinion
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: borrowFunds
functionDecorators.description: Allows minion to borrow funds from Aave Requires that the minion holds sufficient aTokens as collateral. uses the proposeAction() function in order to submit a proposal for the borrow action.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The underlying token to be borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to be borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: rateMode
parameterDecorators.description: Determines whether using stable or variable debt.

parameterDecorators.name: onBehalfOf
parameterDecorators.description: Used for credit delegation if borrowing using another's collateral *.

functionDecorators.name: calcFees
functionDecorators.description: Calculates base fees. Total earnings = balance of aToken in minion - earnings pegAdjust fee by amt being withdrawn / total balance of aToken in minion.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the aToken.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount being withdrawn*.

functionDecorators.name: calcMemberEarnings
functionDecorators.description: Calculates member earnings w/r to a single token. Member earnings = balance of member's share of aToken in minion - member's share of earnings pegAdjusted by previous withdraws of the token for earnings.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the aToken.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: The amount being withdrawn*.

functionDecorators.name: cancelAaveProposal
functionDecorators.description: Simple function to cancel Aave-related proposals. Can only be called by proposerCan only be called if the proposal has not been sponsored in DAO.

parameterDecorators.name: proposalId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the proposal to be cancelled.

parameterDecorators.name: propType
parameterDecorators.description: The type of proposal to be cancelled*.

functionDecorators.name: daoWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws funds from the minion by tributing them into the DAO via proposal for 0 shares / 0 loot. can be undone by DAO if they vote down proposal or msg.sender cancels takes a fee on aTokens withdrawn, since we don't otherwise get that fee.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The underlying token to be withdrawn from Aave.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to be taken out of Aave.

parameterDecorators.name: details
parameterDecorators.description: Used for proposal details*.

functionDecorators.name: depositCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Special proposal function to make funding the minion via a DAO proposal and moving those funds into Aave easy.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The base token to be wrapped in Aave.

parameterDecorators.name: paymentRequested
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens to be requested from.

parameterDecorators.name: details
parameterDecorators.description: Details for the DAO proposal.

functionDecorators.name: doWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws funds from any Moloch into this Minion Set as an public function to allow for member or this contract to call via proposal.

parameterDecorators.name: targetDao
parameterDecorators.description: the dao from which the minion is withdrawing funds.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: the token being withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount being withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: executeBorrow
functionDecorators.description: Executes the borrowFunds() proposal once it's passed a. requires a special processing function in order to check health and track liabities calls the aavePool borrow() function to borrow funds from Aave with dTokens being held in minion.

parameterDecorators.name: proposalId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the associated proposal*.

functionDecorators.name: executeCollateralDeposit
functionDecorators.description: Executes the depositCollateral() proposal once it's passed. calls the doWithdraw() function to remove funds from the DAO calls the aavePool deposit() function to immediately move those funds into aTokens.

parameterDecorators.name: proposalId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the associated proposal*.

functionDecorators.name: executeCollateralWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Executes the proposeWithdrawCollateral() proposal once it's passed. requires a special processing function in order to check health and track remaning assets calls the aavePool withdraw() function to swap aTokens for tokens back to the aavePartyMinions.

parameterDecorators.name: proposalId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the associated proposal*.

functionDecorators.name: executeLoanRepay
functionDecorators.description: Executes the proposeRepayLoan() proposal once it's passed. repays loan by sending tokens and having Aave burn dTokens.

parameterDecorators.name: proposalId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the associated proposal*.

functionDecorators.name: executeToggleEarnings
functionDecorators.description: Executes function above when proposal has passed.

parameterDecorators.name: proposalId
parameterDecorators.description: of that EarningsToggled proposal*.

functionDecorators.name: init
functionDecorators.description: Takes place of constructor function with EIP-1167.

parameterDecorators.name: _dao
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the child dao joining UberHaus.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address recieving fees.

parameterDecorators.name: _aavePool
parameterDecorators.description: The initial AavePool interface address.

parameterDecorators.name: _aaveData
parameterDecorators.description: The initial AaveDataProvider interface address.

parameterDecorators.name: _minionId
parameterDecorators.description: Helps to track minion.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeFactor
parameterDecorators.description: Fee in basis points.

parameterDecorators.name: _minHealthFactor
parameterDecorators.description: Minimum Aave Health Factor in Wei.

parameterDecorators.name: _desc
parameterDecorators.description: Name or description of the minion.

functionDecorators.name: isHealthy
functionDecorators.description: Checks whether the current health is greater minHealthFactor. Should check transaction's effects on health factor on front-end*.

functionDecorators.name: proposeToggleEarnings
functionDecorators.description: Simple function to turn rewardsOn for a token.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token having its earnings EarningsToggled.

parameterDecorators.name: details
parameterDecorators.description: Human readable details for the proposal*.

functionDecorators.name: repayLoan
functionDecorators.description: Allows minion to repay funds borrowed from Aave. uses the proposeRepayLoan() function in order to submit a proposal for the withdraw actiononBehalfOf will usually be the minion address.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The underlying token to be withdrawn from Aave.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to be taken out of Aave.

parameterDecorators.name: rateMode
parameterDecorators.description: whether loan uses a stable or variable rate.

parameterDecorators.name: onBehalfOf
parameterDecorators.description: should be minion address, except in special circumstances.

parameterDecorators.name: details
parameterDecorators.description: Used for proposal details*.

functionDecorators.name: resetAavePool
functionDecorators.description: Simple function to update the lending pool address Can be called by any member of the DAO*.

functionDecorators.name: resetDataProvider
functionDecorators.description: Simple function to update the data provider address Can be called by any member of the DAO*.

functionDecorators.name: undoAction
functionDecorators.description: Simple function to cancel proposals that use actions. Can only be called by proposerCan only be called if the proposal has not been sponsored in DAO.

parameterDecorators.name: proposalId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the proposal to be cancelled*.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Allows minion to withdraw funds from Aave. destination is limited to the DAO or the minion for security uses the proposeWithdrawCollateral() function in order to submit a proposal for the withdraw actionchecks health factory at point of execution.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The underlying token to be withdrawn from Aave.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to be taken out of Aave.

parameterDecorators.name: destination
parameterDecorators.description: Where withdrawn tokens get dumped.

parameterDecorators.name: details
parameterDecorators.description: Used for proposal details*.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawMyEarnings
functionDecorators.description: Allows DAO member to withdraw their share of earnings of a particular token. Earnings withdraws need to be turned on by the DAO first Destination is restricted to the member or the DAO (if they're feeling generous).

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The token with earnings to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: destination
parameterDecorators.description: Where member sends their earnings *.
